member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus
member.summary: Defines a payload to be used by the method. This structure is a generic version of XPS_JOB_STATUS.

member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus.CurrentDocument
member.summary: The zero-based index of the most recently processed document.

member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus.CurrentPage
member.summary: The zero-based index of the most recently processed page in the current document

member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus.CurrentPageTotal
member.summary: A running total of the number of pages that have been processed by the print job.

member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus.Completion
member.summary: The completion status of the job.

member.name: PrintDocumentPackageStatus.PackageStatus
member.summary: The error state of the job.
